question:
You are having a party and want to invite your friend from a different city.
Write letter to your friend. In your letter:
—Describe why are you having a party
—Give directions on how to get to the venue
—suggest how you can accommodate him/her
Write at least 150 words. You do not need to write any addresses
text: I hope you are healthy and happy. I am writing this letter to tell you some amazing news and wanted to invite you to attend a party.

Firstly, I am so happy to share this news that I finally bought my dream flat. That is why, I am throwing a party for friends and family on 15th June'2022, and my dear friend you need to be here with me to celebrate my joy. You need not worry about the accommodation as you are going to stay with me in my new home.

To reach my place, you need to book a cab to Noida from the railway station. My new address is Sector 46, which is almost an hour's drive from the station. Once you are about to reach just give me a call 5 minutes prior and I'll be at the gate to receive you.
Just can't wait to meet you. Come soon and travel safely.
